ingredient_list: 1 (15 ounce) can canned chickpeas, rinsed and drained
1 1/2 cups chopped chickweed leaves and stems
directions_instructions: Place chickpeas, lemon juice, tahini, oil, garlic, cumin, pepper, and salt in the bowl of a food processor and puree. Add chickweed and pulse until it is minced and well combined. Taste and adjust lemon juice, cumin, salt, and pepper as needed.
nutrition_summary: 202 calories; protein 4.5g; carbohydrates 14.3g; fat 15.3g; sodium 122.6mg. Full Nutrition
